website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive sprayer that can help you clean small projects at home.
pros: Comes with a long hose and a quick connect for your power adapter
Works well for cleaning the car or siding
Good quality for the price and size of the product
cons: Does not have much variability on the sprayer and takes effort to clean off tough dirt and stains

customer_reviews.title: GREAT economy pressure washer !
customer_reviews.text: I paid $65 prime offseason, and this pressure washer works pretty well. I am removing paint in the video, using very hot water. Similar results with cold water, but it takes longer to release the paint. I also pressure washed lots of mold from timber/studs, floors sheeting ect. I havent tried it on my car or truck yet.
customer_reviews.author: JP Moneybags

customer_reviews.title: Seems too small, but does a great job
customer_reviews.text: This thing hangs on my pegboard like a toy pressure washer, but the reality is that I plugged it in, connected a water hose, and proceeded to blast away years of grime from a retaining wall, foundation, and driveway without stopping. Much better, at a fraction of the cost, than the big Swiss machine it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: BB & T

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, but proprietary
customer_reviews.text: I bought it primarily for washing my car. Does a good job; easy to setup and operate. Ned to get separate foam cannon as the included detergent bottle was inadequate. If the foaming had been better I would have given 5 stars UPDATE This works as expected, but the proprietary connectors severely limit what you can do. There are many aftermarket attachments that cannot be used because of this limitation, and the Realm attachments (especially the soap bottle) cannot compete with foam cannons that use standard quick connects. Look elsewhere if you want a machine with more options
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great power washer!
customer_reviews.text: Having never used or owned a power washer, I was looking for something small yet powerful enough to clean my limestone patio, as well as wash my car. This was easy to assemble, nice and compact, easy to use and very powerful. It cleaned my patio wonderfully and I am looking forward to using it on my car. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!! I picked a winner out of a multitude of options out there!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great price! It is super easy to use and does a terrific job on everything I task it to. I did a LOT of research before deciding on this make/model, out of the dozens & dozens available. I have used it on everything from the car, to the concrete, to the deck...and I am NOT disappointed in any way, shape, or form so far.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This was a good choice and I'm very pleased with it's performance and ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked High and low for small power washer for home use. This was a good choice and I'm very pleased with it's performance and versatility. Service was excellent and delivery prompt and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Palladin

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, low pressure
customer_reviews.text: Simply not a quality product. Even the Realm logo is chintz: a sticker. Doesn't generate much pressure, so you don't get much of a powerful stream of water, which is, you know, the point of it all.. I stopped about 10 minutes into the first use, turned it off and have boxed it up to return. That said, the connections due seem solid enough. No leakage at the wand, the pressure hose or the connection to the garden hose.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Brancatelli

customer_reviews.title: Really good electric model washer
customer_reviews.text: Really good electric model washer. The adjustable nozzle, as well as lengthy electric cord and high-pressure hose are great. And I love that I can actually carry this thing around with one hand, and won't have to drain a gas tank every year. It is powerful enough for most reasonable home use, like siding and deck cleaning, and can be used for washing cars.The unit is quiet and fairly powerful. I am very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: guangwei wu

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this power washer after returning one that was more expensive and powerful, but also much heavier. This power washer has an adjustable nozzle, which the other one I purchased did not come with. It's very lightweight and does not damage wood decking.
customer_reviews.author: lynn knopf

customer_reviews.title: Nice powerful sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Was delivered quickly and as described. Powerful sprayer and included attachments are handy to have.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy, it peeled off a layer of my wooden ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy, it peeled off a layer of my wooden chair, making it look brand new, and cleaned my concrete driveway so well that my husband was able to write a little line with its nozzle. For the reference, 1600 psi might still be not enough for really heavy duty residential work.
customer_reviews.author: icybb

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: first of all, they do not send the screws to attach the handle. no recommendations on what size screw to purchase. it is trial and error, more often error. the machine itself is not powerful enough to clean a deck or a home. my hose has more pressure than this machine. by the time i used it, the return window had closed.
customer_reviews.author: LHO

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. Cleaned truck engines, tractor, & windows on the house. has good preasure but does not damage wiring & snaller items.
customer_reviews.author: Recon

customer_reviews.title: Thought I would hate it but I love it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for my purposes, small, very lightweight, surprisingly quiet. I cleaned my car engine with just the water pressure on first use, excellent. My only complaints are that it arrived in the original flimsy retail box with no other protection and one of the accessory hangers was broken off and the power plug prongs were smashed flat; I very carefully eased these upright again but unsure because was smashed totally flat. Otherwise the item works well, I would recommend this for anyone challenged by heavier items.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I use this at least twice a week on our autos. I like the the soap canister attachment. I use in conjunction with my washing brush instead of a pail. I use wash n wax combo in canister and actually uses less solution this way. Easy to change attachments. Like the variable adjustment on spray nozzle. So far I have had no issues and would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Trailwinder50

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: Needs more settings on sprayer but for the price. So far so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for jobs around the house
customer_reviews.text: Used it for an all day cleaning event at my church...worked great...expect it to do the same around my house :-)
customer_reviews.author: C Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item on sale. I worked nicely while it works for the first 6-10times. Over the time it simply started leaking from everywhere. Did the regular maintaince on the item.
customer_reviews.author: d.s

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: well husband go it at christmas it has finally become warm enough to use has used it about 5 times and now it wants to lug and has no pressure
customer_reviews.author: A.Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Product is light weight and easy to operate. It obviously does not have the power of a larger gas powered unit but is great for washing siding and other small home projects. This is a update to my first review...after one acceptable use, the pressure washer won't start. The company has refused to replace the product. Amazon is now trying to resolve the situation. Choose another pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: Greg E.

customer_reviews.title: Lock
customer_reviews.text: It did a good job... my finger hurt, did not get lock button to work
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pressure Washer for the Price
customer_reviews.text: So far, this product has been great. I've used it to wash the car and the siding on my house. Not the best on the market, but good value and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Perry

customer_reviews.title: Little but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for a small machine, Just wish it had a wider spray! It does the job, just takes longer! I`m satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: marleen k oleary

customer_reviews.title: We love this pressure wash for cleaning our cards in the ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this pressure wash for cleaning our cards in the driveway. It doesn't make that much noise and has enough power. So simple and light that it is good for ladies to use :-) Con...always needs extension cord.... this one doesn't have enough long. Still we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie A

customer_reviews.title: Small and strong
customer_reviews.text: Small and was surprise how well it works . I will recommend
customer_reviews.author: Robert flores

customer_reviews.title: My husband has used this to clean our carport which ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used this to clean our carport which has not truly been done since we've been in the house. Took several hours of constant washing to complete the job, but his only complaint was the short handle on the unit. The wand itself is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Not enough pressure to wash the side of the home.
customer_reviews.text: The tip constantly gets clogged and needs to be cleaned with the provided pin gadget. Not enough pressure and does not provide power cord and hose reel.
customer_reviews.author: P.H

customer_reviews.title: Power Washer
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was stronger but for the price it works great
customer_reviews.author: littlebit

customer_reviews.title: Good electric model
customer_reviews.text: Not as strong as I hoped but does the job
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I used it twice. Does a decent job does not have tons of pressure but does okay for the price. It stopped working 2 minutes into my third use and would not pump anymore and then shut off completely
customer_reviews.author: Justin Mackey

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY portable and easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Goole product. HIGHLY portable and easy to install and use. Now I can do my own car wash at home, could use this to clean the surface of the deck as well. Recommend to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a damaged handle that I "superglued" together instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a damaged handle that I "superglued" together instead of returning it. No screws to attach handle. The directions are very poorly written.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used to clean wood deck before staining. Easy to use and did a good job removing dirt and mold from deck.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Slutsky

customer_reviews.title: Great Product So Far
customer_reviews.text: The item was shipped 30 minutes after I placed an order. Arrived next day. Last weekend, we tried it for the first time. My daughter assembled in in 5 minutes, without even looking at the instructions. Washed half of the porch. It takes time, but cleans well. Not sure how people use it for cars. It is says that you cannot.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Gallo

customer_reviews.title: love my pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: love my pressure washer!!!This is fairly powerful for an eclectic pressure washer. Very easy to assemble and use. I needed a pressure washer to clean off my deck and some concreate,This does a very good job especially for the price. very good luck pressure! I love it sooo much!!
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: updated review- VERY GOOD CUST SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: product hose blew open 1st time i used it. tried to tape it , and split even further DO NOT BUY!- updated- company replaced hose asap, very good customer service
customer_reviews.author: Carl Gattuso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product worked very well on project I was using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: does a really good job of taking off mildew off my mobile home, porch
customer_reviews.author: Mona Arceneaux

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, well made. Great machine for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Second purchase, the first time was a gift from my friend. It performs as well as you expect one to, assembly was quick and got into work right away. Will replace my gas pressure washer on 90% of my household jobs, it has plenty of power. light and quiet. Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought this & it never worked properly I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great price and it did a great job washing my house.
customer_reviews.author: larry l rispress

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: small as hell and once you open box they won't let you return it..they suck
customer_reviews.author: Bill Klingensmith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Leaks everywhere and extremely loud. I would not buy it if i could go back. Update: This piece of garbage doesn't even turn on now after only 4 USES!
customer_reviews.author: Mike E.

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. I hooked this up and it turned on one second then off. Went to another outlet used a different water hose and tried again. Nothing. No power. It's not rocket science. Was easy to set up. I reset the switch on both my end and the power cord. Nothing. Very dissatisfied. One positive thing As a valued Prime customer Amazon is next day picking up via UPS and will credit my original purchasing method same day as pickup; being disabled and far from a UPS drop off this is a Bonus. I love Amazon. I do not like this sprayer. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: tracey dake

customer_reviews.title: I researched several different brands and this was the best price for the
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I researched several different brands and this was the best price for the value
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Oh no
customer_reviews.text: We just got a chance to take this out and use it 5/28/17 but when we plunged it in it does not work what do we do now?
customer_reviews.author: sharon sabella

product_meta.title: Realm 1600 PSI, 1.6 GPM, 13 Amp Electric Pressure Washer with Spray Gun,Adjustable Nozzle,Foam Cannon, Yellow Black
product_meta.description: Size:1600PSI 1.6GpmRealm electric pressure washer is an ideal way to efficiently clean siding, driveways, cars, patio furniture, and lawn equipment with the power of pressurized water jets. It has the most advanced pump with double sealing to ensure good quality. Max 1600PSI and 1.60GPM gives this unit the power to spray and scrape away grit and grime with ease. A 120-Volt, 13-Amp universal motor is lightweight and reliable. The energy-saving auto stop function automatically shuts off the pump when the trigger gun is not engaged, prolonging the life of the pump. All of the connectors use the quick connector: includes the connector between the hose and gun, between the gun and machine, between the gun and the different nozzles, brush and patio cleaner. So you can easily assemble the machine. It provides varies sets of optional accessories for different demands, such as adjustable telescopic rod, snake hose cleaner, turbo nozzle, angle nozzle, brush, and patio cleaner. This pressure washer includes a 19-foot high pressure hose, a high pressure gun with an adjustable nozzle, an adjustable high pressure detergent bottle, a 35-foot GFCI-equipped power cord, all of which can be stored conveniently.
feature_bullets: INCREDIBLE OUTDOOR CLEANING POWER: Powerful 13 Amp motor generates up to 1600 PSI/1.6 GPM for maximum cleaning power;It’s a great tool to help with a variety of uses around the house, can clean decks, patios, driveways, sidewalk, sheds, siding, garden furniture, pavers, bricks, cars, fence, water bottle cage and more
EASY TO ASSEMBLE AND USE: It just needs less than one minute to install with a few simple attachment

ADJUSTABLE PRESSURE NOZZLE AND SOAP DISPENSER: Compare to other interchangeable nozzles, this adjustable nozzle is easier to use, just twist it to tackle light, medium and heavy duty cleaning tasks.Having the adjustable soap dispenser makes the cleaning more efficient and keeps your home looking like new.

TSS (Total Stop System): CSA approved, power washer features safety automatic total stop system (TSS), which automatically shuts down the pump and the motor when trigger gun is not in use, the purpose is to save energy and extend pump life. 35ft power extension cord with built-in GFCI for all external outlets.

PROFESSIONAL SUPPORT AND ENVIRONMENT FRIENDLY: Don’t need gasoline or all the noise and fumes that gasoline powered pressure washers generate. No more worries about gas storage ran out and no need to generate all that pollution as this machine is perfectly capable of getting the job done

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars92 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
